title: Audi's Drive Toward an Electric Vehicle Future
itunes:title: Audi's Drive Toward an Electric Vehicle Future
description:
Spencer Reeder, Director of Sustainability and Government Affairs at Audi of America, discusses preparing Americans for the shift from gas to electric vehicles.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
